abstract: Pabst Brewing says it will open new brewery and restaurant in Milwaukee in 2016 near site of its original brewery.
lead_paragraph: Pabst said its new brewery would make many of its pre-Prohibition brands, as well as new craft beers.

headline.main: Pabst Brewing Plans a Return to Milwaukee
headline.print_headline: Pabst Brewing Plans a Return to Milwaukee

snippet: Pabst said its new brewery would make many of its pre-Prohibition brands, as well as new craft beers.
